text: Lucas Parize dos Santos (born 8 May 1995) is a Peruvian-Brazilian footballer who plays as a midfielder for Los Caimanes. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |Sport Victoria |2018 |Peruvian Segunda División |4||0||0||0||0||0||4||0 |- |Los Caimanes |2019 |Liga 2 |0||0||0||0||0||0||0||0 |- ! colspan="3" |Career total !4!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!4!!0 |} ;Notes ==References== Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Peruvian footballers Category:Peruvian expatriate footballers Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:SV Waldhof Mannheim players Category:SC Fortuna Köln players Category:Sport Victoria players Category:Los Caimanes footballers Category:Peruvian expatriate sportspeople in Germany Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Germany Category:Expatriate footballers in Germany
title: Lucas dos Santos
